alert.note: Alert for Craig; Mayes; Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 12:48PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Craig, eastern Rogers, Mayes, central Wagoner and northwestern Cherokee Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1248 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Foyil to 5 miles northwest of Porter. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Wagoner... Vinita... Pryor... Pryor Creek... Chouteau... Chelsea... Inola... Locust Grove... Salina... Adair... Okay... Hulbert... Porter... Foyil... Big Cabin... Pensacola... Hoot Owl... Cherokee State Park... Spavinaw State Park... Sportsmen Acres Community... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 251 and 285. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
